content: **simple keyhole scarf** i m currently creating pieces for a market and thought up this pattern because it s fast easy unisex and suitable for multiple ages there are some notes in the pattern if you would like to increase the length you can t go wrong with this pattern i hope you like it the yarn i used is gründl living but any super chunky/super bulky yarn should do the trick some substitutes for the yarn i used are * james c brett lazy days super chunky * premier yarns serenity chunky * bernat softee chunky * caron chunky cakes you can find more subs here 1 feel free to tag me on ig @ginger_hook if you make this scarf 1 https //yarnsub com/yarns/four_seasons_grundl/living
